          <title>
            <string language="sl">Južna Evropa - osmica</string>
            <string language="en">South Europe - word search puzzle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Südeuropa - Wortsuchpuzzlespiel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Europe du sud - puzzle de recherche de mot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Europa sul - enigma da busca da palavra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Europa del sud - puzzle di ricerca di parola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νότια Ευρώπη - γρίφος αναζήτησης λέξης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Europa del sur - rompecabezas de la búsqueda de la
palabra</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Iskanje besed v črkovni mreži povezanih z Južno Evropo (podnebje, rastlinstvo, prsti in vode).</string>
            <string language="en">Finding the words in the character mesh related to the South Europe (climate, vegetation, soil and water).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">podnebje</string>
            <string language="en">climate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">osmica</string>
            <string language="en">word search puzzle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">rastlinstvo</string>
            <string language="en">vegetation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">južna evropa</string>
            <string language="en">south europe</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Finden der Wörter im Zeichenineinandergreifen 
stand auf dem Südeuropa in Verbindung (Klima, Vegetation, Boden und 
Wasser).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La conclusion des mots dans la maille de caractère
a associé à l'Europe du sud (climat, végétation, sol et eau).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontrar as palavras no engranzamento do caráter 
relacionou-se à Europa sul (clima, vegetação, solo e água).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'individuazione delle parole nella maglia del 
carattere si è riferita all'Europa del sud (clima, vegetazione, 
terreno ed acqua).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εύρεση των λέξεων στο πλέγμα χαρακτήρα αφορούσε τη 
νότια Ευρώπη (κλίμα, βλάστηση, χώμα και ύδωρ).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Encontrar las palabras en el acoplamiento del 
carácter se relacionó con la Europa del sur (clima, vegetación, 
suelo y agua).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klima</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortsuchpuzzlespiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vegetation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Südeuropa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
